verses.verse: Let not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G5015>troubled:<s%> you <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in me.

In my <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3438>mansions:<s%> if <S%G1490><s%> it were not so, I would have <S%G2036>told<s%> you. I <S%G4198>go<s%> to <S%G2090>prepare<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> for you.

And <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> and <S%G2090>prepare<s%> a <S%G5117>place<s%> for you, I will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> and <S%G3880>receive<s%> you to <S%G1683>myself;<s%> that <S%G3699>where<s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> there you may be also. <S%G2532><s%>
And <S%G3699>where<s%> I <S%G5217>go<s%> you <S%G1492>know,<s%> and the <S%G3598>way<s%> you know. <S%G1492><s%>
<S%G2381>Thomas<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> not <S%G4226>where<s%> you <S%G5217>go;<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> we know the <S%G3598>way?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, I <S%G1510>am<s%> the <S%G3598>way,<s%> the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and the <S%G2222>life:<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> but by me.

<S%G1487>If<s%> you had <S%G1097>known<s%> me, you should have <S%G1097>known<s%> my <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> and from now <S%G737>on<s%> you <S%G1097>know<s%> him, and have <S%G3708>seen<s%> him.
<S%G5376>Philip<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1166>show<s%> us the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and it <S%G714>suffises<s%> us.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, Have I <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>long<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> with you, and yet have you not <S%G1097>known<s%> me, <S%G5376>Philip?<s%> he that has <S%G3708>seen<s%> me has <S%G3708>seen<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and <S%G4459>how<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> you then, <S%G1166>Show<s%> us the Father? <S%G3962><s%>

<S%G4100>Believe<s%> you not that I am in the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> in me? the <S%G4487>words<s%> that I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to you I <S%G2980>speak<s%> not of <S%G1683>myself:<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father<s%> that <S%G3306>dwells<s%> in me, he <S%G4160>does<s%> the works. <S%G2041><s%>
<S%G4100>Believe<s%> me that I am in the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and the <S%G3962>Father<s%> in me: <S%G1161>or<s%> <S%G1490>else<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%> me for the very <S%G2041>works'<s%> sake.

<S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, He that <S%G4100>believes<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> me, the <S%G2041>works<s%> that I <S%G4160>do<s%> shall he <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2548>also;<s%> and <S%G3187>greater<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> than <S%G5130>these<s%> shall he <S%G4160>do;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> to my Father. <S%G3962><s%>

And whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you shall <S%G154>ask<s%> in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> that will I <S%G4160>do,<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> may be <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in the Son. <S%G5207><s%>
<S%G1437>If<s%> you shall <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> I will do <S%G4160><s%> it.
<S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G25>love<s%> me, <S%G5083>keep<s%> my commandments. <S%G1785><s%>
And I will <S%G2065>pray<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and he shall <S%G1325>give<s%> you <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3875>Comforter,<s%> that he may <S%G3306>abide<s%> with you for ever; <S%G165><s%>

Even the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G225>truth;<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2983>receive,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> it <S%G2334>sees<s%> him not, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> him: but you <S%G1492>know<s%> him; for he <S%G3306>dwells<s%> with you, and shall be in you.
I will not <S%G863>leave<s%> you <S%G3737>comfortless:<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you.

<S%G2089>Yet<s%> a <S%G3397>little<s%> while, and the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2334>sees<s%> me <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G2089>more;<s%> but you <S%G2334>see<s%> me: <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2198>live,<s%> you shall <S%G2198>live<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
<S%G1722>At<s%> that <S%G2250>day<s%> you shall <S%G1097>know<s%> that I am in my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and you in me, and I in you.

He that <S%G2192>has<s%> my <S%G1785>commandments,<s%> and <S%G5083>keeps<s%> them, he it is that <S%G25>loves<s%> me: and he that <S%G25>loves<s%> me shall be <S%G25>loved<s%> of my <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and I will <S%G25>love<s%> him, and will <S%G1718>manifest<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> to him.

<S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, not <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> is it that you will <S%G1718>manifest<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> to us, and not to the <S%G2889>world?<s%>

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1437>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> me, he will <S%G5083>keep<s%> my <S%G3056>words:<s%> and my <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G25>love<s%> him, and we will <S%G2064>come<s%> to him, and <S%G4160>make<s%> our <S%G3438>stayed<s%> with him.

He that <S%G25>loves<s%> me not <S%G5083>keeps<s%> not my <S%G3056>sayings:<s%> and the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G191>hear<s%> is not <S%G1699>mine,<s%> but the <S%G3962>Father's<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3992>sent<s%> me.
<S%G5023>These<s%> things have I <S%G2980>spoken<s%> to you, being yet <S%G3306>present<s%> with you.

But the Comforter, <S%G3875><s%> which is the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> will <S%G3992>send<s%> in my <S%G3686>name,<s%> he shall <S%G1321>teach<s%> you <S%G3956>all<s%> things, and <S%G5279>bring<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things to <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G5279>remembrance,<s%> <S%G3739>whatever<s%> I have <S%G2036>said<s%> to you.

<S%G1515>Peace<s%> I <S%G863>leave<s%> with you, my <S%G1515>peace<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you: not as the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G1325>gives,<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> I to you. Let not <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> be <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> let it be afraid. <S%G1168><s%>

You have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>how<s%> I <S%G2036>said<s%> to you, I <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G5217>away,<s%> and come <S%G2064><s%> again to you. <S%G1487>If<s%> you <S%G25>loved<s%> me, you would <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> I <S%G2036>said,<s%> I <S%G4198>go<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father:<s%> for my <S%G3962>Father<s%> is <S%G3187>greater<s%> than I.
And <S%G3568>now<s%> I have <S%G2046>told<s%> you <S%G4250>before<s%> it <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, that, <S%G3752>when<s%> it is <S%G1096>come<s%> to pass, you might believe. <S%G4100><s%>

<S%G2089>Hereafter<s%> I will not <S%G2980>talk<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> with you: for the <S%G758>prince<s%> of <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G2064>comes,<s%> and <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> in me.

But that the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1097>know<s%> that I <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%> and as the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G1781>gave<s%> me <S%G1781>commandment,<s%> even <S%G3779>so<s%> I <S%G4160>do.<s%> <S%G1453>Arise,<s%> let us <S%G71>go<s%> hence. <S%G1782><s%>
